this and halo are the two most important games in fps history. 
goldeneye gave us awesome multiplayer and custom gametypes, which made it incredibily fun
halo gave us balancing in a first person shooter. 
every other game is built off these two games. nothing revolutionary has been for multiplayer as these two have.
